wikipedia_page.main: Anuja Ravindra Dhir QC (born 19 January 1968 at Dundee, Scotland), also styled Lady Lavender, is the first non-white judge to be appointed to sit at the Old Bailey.

response: * Anuja Dhir, HH Judge Anuja Dhir, Circuit Judge at the Old Bailey (and first non-white woman judge at the  Old Bailey).
